alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 9:12AM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. .Recent dry weather has lead to cresting or falling river levels. With all rivers expected to be past crest before the next chance of rainfall Tuesday night into Wednesday, continued improvement is expected. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 AM CDT Tuesday, the stage was 23.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 AM CDT Tuesday was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below Moderate flood stage late Tuesday night and to 22.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.8 feet on 08/13/2016. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
